I'm seeing some different behavior in FF4 where if you shutdown your main browser while you have active downloads, it does not kill the downloads (expected behavior) but does not obey the startup rules when you bring the browser back up and defaults to last visited page. My startup is set to a specific home page. I don't remember this being the case in FF3.6, is anyone else seeing this behavior? 

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1.Start a download session, download window opens, ensure you are on a different page in your main browser than your home page
2.Close main browser, download window stays active
3.Reopen main browser, it will default to last page viewed


Expected Results:  
My understanding is that it should keep your prefs regardless.  I don't remember having this problem in 3.6.
